      • insertSongsFromMusicBrainz

        public void insertSongsFromMusicBrainz(java.sql.Statement statement,
                                       java.lang.String songName,
                                       Library library)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        statement - SQLite statement
        songName - song name
        library - music library
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - This finds a song in the library or MusicBrainz and automatically fill in missing details of that song based on song name. This also finds the artist and album of that song in the library or MusicBrainz. PLEASE NOTE: The song will be imported to the library and database only if the right song, artist, album are all found.

      • buildConnectionWithMusicBrainz

        public void buildConnectionWithMusicBrainz(java.lang.String songName,
                                           java.lang.StringBuilder response)
        Parameters:
        songName - song name
        response - MusicBrainz searching result This builds connection with MusicBrainz.

      • grabSongs

        public Song grabSongs(java.lang.StringBuilder response,
                      java.lang.String songName,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Song> duplicatedSongs,
                      Library library)
        Parameters:
        response - MusicBrainz searching result
        songName - song name
        duplicatedSongs - arrayList of songs
        library - music library
        Returns:
        song object / null This grabs ar most 5 qualified songs in AudioDB and stores them in an arrayList of songs.

      • selectSong

        public Song selectSong(java.util.ArrayList<Song> duplicatedSongs,
                       Library library)
        Parameters:
        duplicatedSongs - arrayList of songs
        library - music library
        Returns:
        song object / null This lets users to chose which song is the right one. This returns the song object if there is a song chosen by users, otherwise returns null.
